sentences.english: Because of its own characteristics of the floodlight, the satisfied (result) cannot be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 由於泛光燈自身的特點，使效果不能達到理想。

sentences.english: It is not suitable to open lamp of normal temperature and it has more excellent brightness in luminaire fixtures.
sentences.chinese: 不適用常溫敞開式燈具，在泛光燈具內亮度更好。

sentences.english: Notre Dame cathedral will be floodlit at night.
sentences.chinese: 聖母院大教堂晚上將點起泛光燈。

sentences.english: A floodlit soul is bare but not raw, uncovered but not weak. Nothing remains hidden;
sentences.chinese: 暴露在泛光燈下的靈魂並不粗糙，也不虛弱。

sentences.english: It can match various existing luminaires excellently.
sentences.chinese: 與現有各款式泛光燈具能較好匹配。

sentences.english: By now, the high-power floodlight has been adopted.
sentences.chinese: 目前大多采用大功率泛光燈作補償光源。

sentences.english: In addition to the above mentioned. I also need four outdoor automatic flood lights.
sentences.chinese: 又及，我還需要四個戶外自動泛光燈。

sentences.english: Omni's make your light scatter nicely.
sentences.chinese: 泛光燈使你的燈光發散的更漂亮。

sentences.english: That makes them fine for floodlights or traffic signs.
sentences.chinese: 用它們作泛光燈或者交通燈其實更合適。
